NPC ID3933

Yrsa is a fashion designer and runs Yrsa's Accoutrements, and the makeover shop, Yrsa's Shoe Store. She plays a role in Sigmund the Merchant's task in The Fremennik Trials quest. She will change the colour and style of your shoes for 500 gp.

As with most Fremenniks who are traders, Yrsa will not change your shoes if you have not completed The Fremennik Trials quest.

Contents

  • 1 Yrsa's Shoe Store
  • 2 Yrsa's Accoutrements
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Yrsa's Shoe Store[edit | edit source]

Main article: Yrsa's Shoe Store

Yrsa offers a very wide variety of shoes (and shoe colours) that the player can choose from. It costs 500 coins to change your default shoes.

Yrsa's Accoutrements[edit | edit source]

Main article: Yrsa's Accoutrements

Yrsa sells a variety of fremennik clothing including hat, robe, shirt, skirt, cloak, gloves and boots. The shirts and cloaks are sold in different colours.

Sells at: 130.0% • Buys at: 70.0% • Change per: 3.0%

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
19 September 2013
(update)

Thessalia, the hairdresser, the Makeover Mage and Yrsa now have right-click options for accessing their makeover services.
